title: Workshop on Enhancing Competency in Instructional Design Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Educational planning and basic digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Emphasizing strategies for selecting and utilizing instructional design tools applicable to real-world contexts for educational administrators/leaders

learning_goals: Learners can explain a decision-making model that considers situational factors (personal preferences, work environment) when selecting instructional design tools.
Learners can analyze appropriate use cases of digital/analog tools and propose tool combinations tailored to work contexts.
Learners can present tool application results to real educational design scenarios and incorporate feedback through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
